naslov: Villa u Dugopolju sa bazenom – odlična investicija (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji prekrasne Ville u Dugopolju u mirnom okruženju koja se sastoji od dvije etaže ukupne površine 280m2. Na donjoj etaži su dnevni dio, dvije spavaće sobe, a jedna od njih ima svoj wc sa tuš kabinom, još jedan veći wc, kuhinja, te ljetna kuhinja sa nadstrešnicom i kaminom, te smočnica. Ispred se nalazi i bazen za relaksaciju i hlađenje u toplim ljetnim danima. Na gornjoj etaži su još dvije sobe(jedna sa wc-om u njoj), teretana, biljar, prostor za rekreaciju i opuštanje (stolni nogomet), te natkrivena terasa. Ispred se nalaze dvije garaže iz kojih se direktno ulazi u kuću. Villa se nalazi 22 km od Splita i 40 km od Trogira. Do najbliže zračne luke u Splitu ima 34 km. Odlična je za turizam jer se koristi već u tu svrhu, te sadašnjim vlasnicima služi kao već uhodan izvor prihoda. Isto tako je prigoda za življenje ukoliko želite bit u miru i tišini van gradske vreve i buke, a opet jako brzo stići u Split ili Trogir. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt: 091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Villa in Dugopolje with swimming pool - a great investment We are mediating the sale of a beautiful Villa in Dugopolje in a quiet environment, consisting of two floors with a total area of 280m2. On the lower floor are the living room, two bedrooms, one of them has its own toilet with shower, another larger toilet, kitchen, summer kitchen with canopy and fireplace, and pantry. There is also a swimming pool in front for relaxation and cooling on hot summer days. On the upper floor there are two more rooms (one with a toilet), a gym, billiards, a space for recreation and relaxation (table football), and a covered terrace. There are two garages in front, from which you can directly enter the house. The villa is located 22 km from Split and 40 km from Trogir. The nearest airport in Split is 34 km away. It is excellent for tourism because it is already used for this purpose, and it serves as an established source of income for the current owners. It is also an opportunity to live if you want to be in peace and quiet, away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and yet reach Split or Trogir very quickly. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: +385915615115 ŽELJANA
